content: alternate between or- row 14 single_crochet 14sc 6sc up the opposite side ange and gray yarn of chain 19sc 14sc cid 21 54 row 4 3sc 2sc 2inc 2sc single_crochet cid 21 12 row 15 single_crochet 53sc cid 21 54 row 5 2inc 4sc 2inc 4sc cid 21 16 row 16 42sc 6dec cid 21 48 row 6 single_crochet 2sc 6sc 2sc 5sc cid 21 16 row 17 21sc 4sc in the next 2 st 16sc finish o cid 27 leave a tail for sewing 9sc cid 21 54 row 18 3sc 41sc 10sc cid 21 54 feet make two attach safety eyes i placed mine between rounds 9 and 10 around 6st from the limit with orange yarn 1 row 1 6sc in magic_ring cid 21 6 finish o cid 27 leave a tail for sewing row 2-3 2 row 6sc cid 21 6 row 4 increase 2sc *2 cid 21 8 row 5 2inc 2sc *2 cid 21 12 wings make two row 6 12sc cid 21 12 with black yarn row 7 single_crochet increase single_crochet *3 increase single_crochet cid 21 16 row 1 ch7 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in row 8 2sc increase 3sc *3 increase single_crochet cid 21 20 the next 5 6sc on the opposite side of the row 9 3sc increase 4sc *3 increase single_crochet cid 21 24 chain cid 21 12 finish o cid 27 leave a tail for sewing row 2 single_crochet increase *6 cid 21 18 fold your piece cid 29 at the edge should be row 3 2sc increase *6 cid 21 24 along the increases remove the cotton row 4 3sc increase *6 cid 21 30 from two q-tips and fold them in half insert row 5 4sc increase *6 cid 21 36 the cid 28 rst q-tip horizontally along the edge row 6 6sc cid 21 6 of the piece to make the two external toes row 7 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and in of the bird insert the second q-tip in the next 10st cid 21 11 middle to make the middle toe and poke it row 8 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and in through the top/back of the foot between next 9st cid 21 10 round 3 and 4 to go in the leg row 9 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and in use the tail of your piece to sew along the next 8st cid 21 9 toe to cid 28 x the q-tips in place then sew the row 10 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and top and bottom edge of the piece to shut in next 7st cid 21 8 the piece row 11 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and in next 6st cid 21 7 row 12 turn single_crochet in 2nd st from hook and legs make two in next 5st cid 21 6 you can crochet directly around the q-tip row 13 turn single_crochet in 2nd
